name: Cala Market
description: A bustling desert market in the city of Cala.

objects.name: market_stall
objects.description: A wooden market stall with a canopy, used for displaying goods.
objects.prompt: An isolated wooden market stall with a simple frame and a canvas canopy. The wood is weathered and has a natural brown tone with visible grain. The canopy is made of beige fabric, slightly worn and patched, with simple ties securing it to the frame. No background, centered in frame.
objects.placement_notes: Arrange in rows on either side of the market street.

objects.name: clay_pot
objects.description: A large, traditional clay pot used for storing grains or liquids.
objects.prompt: A large, round clay pot with a wide opening and no lid. The surface is rough with a terracotta color, showing natural imperfections and a few chips. The pot is centered in frame on a transparent background.
objects.placement_notes: Positioned next to market stalls and along the street.

objects.name: fruit_basket
objects.description: A woven basket filled with fresh oranges.
objects.prompt: A handwoven basket made from natural fibers, filled with vibrant, ripe oranges. The basket is oval-shaped with two small handles on the sides. The oranges have a bright orange color with a slightly glossy surface. No shadows, centered in frame on a transparent background.
objects.placement_notes: Displayed on top of market stalls.

objects.name: stone_pavement_texture
objects.description: Texture for the stone pavement of the market street.
objects.prompt: A seamless, tileable texture of stone pavement consisting of irregularly shaped, medium-sized stones. The stones are varying shades of grey and beige, with some darker spots. Surface qualities include medium roughness and subtle normal detail. 4K resolution, captured under neutral lighting.
objects.placement_notes: Applied to the ground throughout the market area.

objects.name: canvas_canopy_texture
objects.description: Texture for the canvas canopies above market stalls.
objects.prompt: A seamless, tileable texture of aged canvas fabric, with a beige color and visible woven pattern. The texture has slight variations in tone, with areas of light wear and tear. Surface qualities include medium roughness. 2K resolution, captured under neutral lighting.
objects.placement_notes: Applied to the canopies of all market stalls.

objects.name: market_ambience
objects.description: Background audio of a bustling desert market.
objects.prompt: A 30-second loop of ambient market sounds, including distant chatter, occasional laughter, and the soft rustling of fabric and footsteps on stone. The mood is lively and busy, with sounds coming from various directions. Seamless looping is required.
objects.placement_notes: Set as ambient sound throughout the market area.

objects.name: palm_tree
objects.description: A tall palm tree with lush green fronds.
objects.prompt: A tall palm tree with a slender, textured trunk and a crown of lush, green fronds. The trunk is brown with visible rings and slight bends. The fronds are long and arching, with a vibrant green color. Centered in frame on a transparent background.
objects.placement_notes: Positioned at the edges of the market area for natural scenery.
